reg_info.act_under: Land Titles Act   Loi sur l’enregistrement des droits immobiliers

content.content:
1. The fees set out in the Schedule are payable under the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 689, s. 1. SCHEDULE   TARIFF OF FEES  Item

 

Column 1

Column 2


 

 

Service

Fee


1.

 

Except as set out in items 2 and 3, for registration or deposit of an instrument or plan, including recording

$50.00


2.

 

For registration of,

 


 

 

(a) a certificate under subsection 3 (3) of the Housing Development Act;

 


 

 

(b) a notice of credit or refund or a certificate of discharge under subsection 2 (5) of The Municipal and School Tax Credit Assistance Act, being chapter 285 of the Revised Statutes of Ontario, 1970;

 


 

 

(c) a lien clearance certificate or affidavit of exemption under The Land Speculation Tax Act, 1974, being chapter 17;

 


 

 

(d) a copy of the plan and field notes of a municipal or crown resurvey under Part VIII of the Surveys Act;

 


 

 

(e) a notice of a change of address for service; or

 


 

 

(f) a plan under the Boundaries Act

No fee


3.

 

For registration of,

 


 

 

(a) a declaration and description under the Condominium Act,

 


 

 

(i) basic fee

50.00


 

 

(ii) for each unit created by the description

5.00


 

 

(b) a plan of subdivision,

 


 

 

(i) basic fee

50.00


 

 

(ii) for each lot or block created by the plan

2.00


4.

 

Revoked: O. Reg. 517/93, s. 1.

 


5.

 

For a search of,

 


 

 

(a) a fee, receiving or day book

No fee


 

 

(b) any other index or register for a parcel

5.00


 

 

(c) an instrument, deposit or plan

No fee


6.

(1)

For a copy of,

 


 

 

(a) an instrument or plan, for each page

.50


 

 

(b) the index or register for a parcel,

 


 

 

(i) for the first page

5.00


 

 

(ii) for each subsequent page

1.00


 

 

(c) Revoked: O. Reg. 5/99, s. 1 (1).

 


 

(2)

For a paper print of a plan, for each page

5.00


 

(3)

For each report showing the details of a writ, lien or order

$6.00 to a maximum of $60.00 for each name searched


7.

(1)

For certifying a copy for which item 6 applies

2.00


 

(2)

For a certificate as to executions under the Land Titles Act, including a search of the execution index, for each name

11.00


 

(3)

For a certificate of search of one parcel under the Land Titles Act or for recertifying a certificate of search, including executions

50.00


8.

 

For the correction of errors, defects and omissions in a registered or deposited plan

50.00 R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 689, Sched.; O. Reg. 324/91, s. 1; O. Reg. 279/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 368/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 325/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 517/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 5/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The fees set out in the Schedule are payable under the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 689, s. 1.

SCHEDULE
TARIFF OF FEES

Item

  

Column 1

Column 2

   

Service

Fee

1.

  

Except as set out in items 2 and 3, for registration or deposit of an instrument or plan, including recording

$50.00

2.

  

For registration of,

  
   

    (a) a certificate under subsection 3 (3) of the Housing Development Act;

  
   

    (b) a notice of credit or refund or a certificate of discharge under subsection 2 (5) of The Municipal and School Tax Credit Assistance Act, being chapter 285 of the Revised Statutes of Ontario, 1970;

  
   

    (c) a lien clearance certificate or affidavit of exemption under The Land Speculation Tax Act, 1974, being chapter 17;

  
   

    (d) a copy of the plan and field notes of a municipal or crown resurvey under Part VIII of the Surveys Act;

  
   

    (e) a notice of a change of address for service; or

  
   

    (f) a plan under the Boundaries Act

No fee

3.

  

For registration of,

  
   

    (a) a declaration and description under the Condominium Act,

  
   

    (i) basic fee

50.00

   

    (ii) for each unit created by the description

5.00

   

    (b) a plan of subdivision,

  
   

    (i) basic fee

50.00

   

    (ii) for each lot or block created by the plan

2.00

4.

  

Revoked: O. Reg. 517/93, s. 1.

  

5.

  

For a search of,

  
   

    (a) a fee, receiving or day book

No fee

   

    (b) any other index or register for a parcel

5.00

   

    (c) an instrument, deposit or plan

No fee

6.

(1)

For a copy of,

  
   

    (a) an instrument or plan, for each page

.50

   

    (b) the index or register for a parcel,

  
   

    (i) for the first page

5.00

   

    (ii) for each subsequent page

1.00

   

    (c) Revoked: O. Reg. 5/99, s. 1 (1).

  
 

(2)

For a paper print of a plan, for each page

5.00

 

(3)

For each report showing the details of a writ, lien or order

$6.00 to a maximum of $60.00 for each name searched

7.

(1)

For certifying a copy for which item 6 applies

2.00

 

(2)

For a certificate as to executions under the Land Titles Act, including a search of the execution index, for each name

11.00

 

(3)

For a certificate of search of one parcel under the Land Titles Act or for recertifying a certificate of search, including executions

50.00

8.

  

For the correction of errors, defects and omissions in a registered or deposited plan

50.00

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 689, Sched.; O. Reg. 324/91, s. 1; O. Reg. 279/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 368/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 325/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 517/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 5/99, s. 1.
